amendment.description: An amendment numbered 83 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to eliminate funding for the Council on Environmental Quality and moves the funding to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for the Council on Environmental Quality by $1 million and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A046) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 243 (Roll no. 396).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A046) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 243 (Roll no. 396).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
